name: FieldSetMember

methods.name: getDBRequired
methods.description: Returns true if the field is required by the field’s definition in its sObject, otherwise, false.

methods.name: getFieldPath
methods.description: Returns a field path string in a format ready to be used in a dynamic SOQL query.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the text label that’s displayed next to the field in the Salesforce user interface.

methods.name: getRequired
methods.description: Returns true if the field is required by the field set, otherwise, false.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the field’s Apex data type.

methods.name: getSObjectField
methods.description: Returns the token for this field.

description: Contains methods for accessing the metadata for field set member fields.
